item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Support
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: Boxed/Full-Width
item6.text: Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system.

item7.title: Customizable Backgrounds
item7.text: Use a different background on every section, you can choose a video, an image or just a plain color.

item8.title: 50+ Sections
item8.text: Included are  50+ sections to choose from to insert into your layouts. The list grows with updates!

item9.title: Advanced Global Settings
item9.text: Change everything including your site colors, container widths, logos and much more!

item10.title: Clean & Minimal
item10.text: A minimal design makes it easy to use for all your work. Not only does it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item11.title: Clean Code
item11.text: The well commented and clean code makes it easy for developers to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimized and expandable.

item12.title: SEO Optimized
item12.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

item13.title: CSS3 Standards
item13.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as item animation on scroll.

item14.title: HMTL5 Standards
item14.text: DMS uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We’ve also added HTML5 markup for WordPress forms, Audio and Video.

color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done.

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

up5v46z.textbox_content:
Create any page layout for any type of website using DMS.
Just add page elements, drag them into place, and add your own content & images. It’s that easy.

item1.title: Step One
item1.text: Open the PageLines front-end editor and make a new row.

item2.title: Step Two
item2.text: Upload your background video .mp4 file or your image for your parallax background.

item3.title: Step Three
item3.text: Customize your section settings and save, you've just made one of these awesome sections in under 10 seconds!

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

item1.title: "PageLines DMS is making a case for being the fastest way to build high-quality, production-ready websites."
item1.text: Anthony Kosner, Forbes.com

item2.title: "The whole point is to cut out the complicated coding that stands between amateurs and most existing WordPress blog plugins"
item2.text: Lauren Orsini, ReadWrite.com

item1.text: "We built DMS for people that care about the details."

item2.text: “Mastery is achieved not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.”

item3.text: “The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.”

item4.text:
“We strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity.
Great design is born of those two things.”

item1.title: Drag &amp Drop Design
item1.text: Control your layout with drag and drop. PageLines was built to use without coding or technical hassle.

item2.title: Mobile & Responsive
item2.text: The design will scale to fit on all browser widths/resolutions and on all mobile devices.

item3.title: Options Galore
item3.text: Everything is customizable with point & click options. Change colors, fonts, and everything else.

item4.title: Built for Perfectionists
item4.text: Built for people that don't compromise. DMS is pixel perfect, lightening fast, and better for marketing.

u3wxic4.pl_standard_title: Everything you need to take it to the next level.

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using the PageLines drag & drop builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: DMS is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts, fonts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was building with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good and rank well on search results.

item7.title: 50+ Sections
item7.text: 50+ sections to insert into your pages so you can create amazing layouts. More added all the time with updates.

item8.title: Boxed or Fullwidth Layouts
item8.text: Quickly switch between boxed or fullwidth layout. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.

item9.title: Clean & Minimal
item9.text: A clean and minimal design, not only will it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item10.title: Clean Code
item10.text: Well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimize and expandable.

item11.title: HTML5
item11.text: The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards.

item12.title: CSS3
item12.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.

item2.text: DMS is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts, fonts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was building with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good and rank well on search results.

item7.title: 50+ Sections
item7.text: 50+ sections to insert into your pages so you can create amazing layouts. More added all the time with updates.

item8.title: Boxed or Fullwidth Layouts
item8.text: Quickly switch between boxed or fullwidth layout. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.

item9.title: Clean & Minimal
item9.text: A clean and minimal design, not only will it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item10.title: Clean Code
item10.text: Well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimize and expandable.

item11.title: HTML5
item11.text: The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards.

item12.title: CSS3
item12.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.

PageLines DMS will help you build custom marketing websites that do wonders.
It has a wide range of incredible features and includes a growing list of goodies…
u3wxic4.pl_standard_title: Everything you need to take it to the next level.

uyf4qss.textbox_content:
You can also insert icons anywhere you want via the built-in Font Awesome icon options.
Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized size,
color, drop shadow, and anything that can be done.

item1.title: Step 1
item1.text: Open the PageLines front-end editor and add a canvas section.

item2.title: Step 2
item2.text: Upload your background video .mp4 file or image for your parallax background.

item3.title: Step 3
item3.text: Customize settings and save, you've just made a section in under 10 seconds!

uph1xs8.textbox_content:
100% Responsive

The design will scale to fit on all browser widths/resolutions and on all mobile devices. Go ahead and scale your browser window and see the results.

u7101us.textbox_content:
DMS comes with full WooCommerce support right out of the box!
No need to mess with WooCommerce styling to fit your site perfectly.

ukgf3vj.textbox_content:
Want to adjust fonts? You can easily switch fonts for all text elements through the options panel
Choose from 600+ free Google web fonts, Each font comes with preview.

u3i4fl4.textbox_content:
Embed any number of videos into your pages.
You can choose any column width and also display self hosted html5 videos

urcnzo8._highlight_subhead:
PageLines DMS will help you build custom marketing websites that do wonders.
It has a wide range of incredible features and includes a growing list of goodies…
everything you need to take it to the next level and save money doing it.

uph1xs8.textbox_content:
100% Responsive

The design will scale to fit on all browser widths/resolutions and on all mobile devices. Go ahead and scale your browser window and see the results.

u8lwvne.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS will help you build custom marketing websites that do wonders.
It has a wide range of incredible features and includes a growing list of goodies…
u8lwvne.pl_standard_title: Everything you need to take it to the next level.

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Support
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: Boxed/Full-Width
item6.text: Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system.

item7.title: Customizable Backgrounds
item7.text: Use a different background on every section, you can choose a video, an image or just a plain color.

item8.title: 50+ Sections
item8.text: Included are  50+ sections to choose from to insert into your layouts. The list grows with updates!

item9.title: Advanced Global Settings
item9.text: Change everything including your site colors, container widths, logos and much more!

item10.title: Clean & Minimal
item10.text: A minimal design makes it easy to use for all your work. Not only does it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item11.title: Clean Code
item11.text: The well commented and clean code makes it easy for developers to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimized and expandable.

item12.title: SEO Optimized
item12.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

item13.title: CSS3 Standards
item13.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as item animation on scroll.

item14.title: HMTL5 Standards
item14.text: DMS uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We’ve also added HTML5 markup for WordPress forms, Audio and Video.

uyf4qss.textbox_content:
You can also insert icons anywhere you want via the built-in Font Awesome icon options.
Font Awesome gives you scalable vector icons that can instantly be customized size,

item7.text: Use a different background on every section, you can choose a video, an image or just a plain color.

item8.title: 50+ Sections
item8.text: Included are  50+ sections to choose from to insert into your layouts. The list grows with updates!

item9.title: Advanced Global Settings
item9.text: Change everything including your site colors, container widths, logos and much more!

item10.title: Clean & Minimal
item10.text: A minimal design makes it easy to use for all your work. Not only does it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item11.title: Clean Code
item11.text: The well commented and clean code makes it easy for developers to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimized and expandable.

item12.title: SEO Optimized
item12.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

item13.title: CSS3 Standards
item13.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as item animation on scroll.

item14.title: HMTL5 Standards
item14.text: DMS uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We’ve also added HTML5 markup for WordPress forms, Audio and Video.

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Support
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: Boxed/Full-Width
item6.text: Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system.

item7.title: Customizable Backgrounds
item7.text: Use a different background on every section, you can choose a video, an image or just a plain color.

item8.title: 50+ Sections
item8.text: Included are  50+ sections to choose from to insert into your layouts. The list grows with updates!

item9.title: Advanced Global Settings
item9.text: Change everything including your site colors, container widths, logos and much more!

item10.title: Clean & Minimal
item10.text: A minimal design makes it easy to use for all your work. Not only does it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item11.title: Clean Code
item11.text: The well commented and clean code makes it easy for developers to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimized and expandable.

item12.title: SEO Optimized
item12.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

item13.title: CSS3 Standards
item13.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as item animation on scroll.

item14.title: HMTL5 Standards
item14.text: DMS uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We’ve also added HTML5 markup for WordPress forms, Audio and Video.

item1.text: “A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.”

item2.text: “The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.”

item3.text:
“I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity.
Great design is born of those two things.”

item1.text: There are three responses to a piece of design – yes, no, and WOW! Wow is the one to aim for

item2.text: Intuitive design is how we give the user new superpowers.

item3.text: “I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity. Great design is born of those two things.”

item2.text: Intuitive design is how we give the user new superpowers.

item3.text: “I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity. Great design is born of those two things.”

item1.title: Step One
item1.text: Open the PageLines front-end editor and make a new row.

draft.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS will help you build custom websites that do wonders.
It has a wide range of incredible features and includes a growing list of goodies…

live.textbox_content:
PageLines DMS will help you build custom websites that do wonders.
It has a wide range of incredible features and includes a growing list of goodies…

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using a drag and drop page builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your posts and pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: The theme is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Support
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: Boxed/Full-Width
item6.text: Quickly switch between boxed or full-width layout. There is no need to dig into the stylesheet or change the grid system.

item7.title: Customizable Backgrounds
item7.text: Use a different background on every section, you can choose a video, an image or just a plain color.

item8.title: 50+ Sections
item8.text: Included are  50+ sections to choose from to insert into your layouts. The list grows with updates!

item9.title: Advanced Global Settings
item9.text: Change everything including your site colors, container widths, logos and much more!

item10.title: Clean & Minimal
item10.text: A minimal design makes it easy to use for all your work. Not only does it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item11.title: Clean Code
item11.text: The well commented and clean code makes it easy for developers to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimized and expandable.

item12.title: SEO Optimized
item12.text: DMS was build with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good, but also rank well on search results.

item13.title: CSS3 Standards
item13.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as item animation on scroll.

item14.title: HMTL5 Standards
item14.text: DMS uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards. We’ve also added HTML5 markup for WordPress forms, Audio and Video.

item1.text:
Excellent Design and so easy to Customize.
This can be used for any type of website.

item2.text: “A designer knows he has achieved perfection not when there is nothing left to add, but when there is nothing left to take away.”

item3.text: “The ultimate promise of technology is to make us master of a world that we command by the push of a button.”

item4.text:
“I strive for two things in design: simplicity and clarity.
Great design is born of those two things.”

item1.title: Drag &amp Drop Design
item1.text: Control your layout with drag and drop. PageLines was built to use without coding or technical hassle.

item2.title: Mobile & Responsive
item2.text: The design will scale to fit on all browser widths/resolutions and on all mobile devices.

item3.title: Options Galore
item3.text: Everything is customizable with point & click options. Change colors, fonts, and everything else.

item4.title: Built for Perfectionists
item4.text: Built for people that don't compromise. DMS is pixel perfect, lightning fast, and better for marketing.

item1.title: Drag & Drop Builder
item1.text: Easily build and save layouts using the PageLines drag & drop builder. Create unlimited layouts for all your pages.

item2.title: Responsive Design
item2.text: DMS is fully responsive no matter how you decide to build your pages. Create layouts that your visitors can enjoy on any device.

item3.title: Unlimited Page Layouts
item3.text: Unlimited color options, page layouts, fonts and animations. You’ll love the endless possibilities of DMS.

item4.title: Preloaded Page Templates
item4.text: Ready with built-in pages, no need to import files so your theme installation is smooth and hassle free.

item5.title: WooCommerce Capability
item5.text: Designed & extended to fit the WooCommerce plugin which allows you to sell products on your site.

item6.title: SEO Standards
item6.text: DMS was building with close attention to SEO. Your site must look good and rank well on search results.

item7.title: 50+ Sections
item7.text: 50+ sections to insert into your pages so you can create amazing layouts. More added all the time with updates.

item8.title: Boxed or Fullwidth Layouts
item8.text: Quickly switch between boxed or fullwidth layout. No need to dig into the stylesheet to get the layout you need.

item9.title: Clean & Minimal
item9.text: A clean and minimal design, not only will it look good for different niches it is also easy to customize.

item10.title: Clean Code
item10.text: Well commented and clean code makes it easy for you to tweak the theme and also keeps it well optimize and expandable.

item11.title: HTML5
item11.text: The theme uses HTML5 so the code is up to the latest standards.

item12.title: CSS3
item12.text: Bringing you the best coding standards as well as some cool new tricks such as element animation on page scroll.
